string.value: #bSpiruna#k, an old woman living somewhere in #bOrbis#k, looks into the crystal ball and sees a dreadful truth. Let's go to #bSpiruna#k.

She says that the #bAncient Creature#k has awakened from its eternal sleep. This creature was the pet of the goddess, and its name is #bEliza#k. #bEliza#k was once known as a very gentle creature, but for some reason it has become ferocious. #bSpiruna#k says that #bEliza#k started to rampage about when the goddess was kidnapped by Pixies, and asks to defeat the Pixies roaming Cloud Park in order to calm #bEliza#k's rage.

#o3230200# #r#a31111##k
#o4230106# #r#a31112##k
#o5120000# #r#a31113##k
Came back after defeating all the Pixies. Has Eliza's rage softened somewhat?

Hmm, this isn't good. Her rage is turning the sky blood red. Curious to know who she is? Her name is #bEliza#k. She's an ancient creature that is Luinel, but at the same time not Luinel. She was the Goddess's favorite pet.

However, you shouldn't underestimate #bEliza#k because she is a pet. Being a goddess' pet means that you would exceed the intelligence, rationality, and wisdom of humans. #bEliza#k was very gentle, quiet, and loved music according to the goddess's records. However...

The #bEliza#k now isn't even near the descriptions of the records. Records on #bEliza#k's strength are the same, but her nature is completely different now. She is ferocious and destroys anything in her way. Her rage is spreading all over Orbis. This has to do with what the #rPixies#k have done.

While #bEliza#k was sleeping, Papa Pixie kidnapped the Goddess, and other Pixies came to take her place. This is why #bEliza#k was enraged. Someone mighty like #bEliza#k can be dangerous when angered. Will you help to calm her rage?
Then please go defeat those Pixies. Defeating #r50 Star Pixies#k, #r100 Lunar Pixies#k, and #r150 Luster Pixies#k roaming the region will help clam #bEliza#k's rage.
Someone needs to step up and stop Eliza's rage.
You've done well with the Pixies. Now #bEliza#k will calm down and become rational once again. Let's wait and see. We can see into #bEliza#k's feelings through this crystal ball.
That's strange.. the red forces have definitely reduced by a lot, but some still remains. What could be the problem?
You haven't defeated all the Pixies yet, haven't you? You need to defeat #r50, 100, and 150#k #rStar Pixiea#k, #rLunar Pixies#k, and #rLuster Pixies#k accordingly in order to calm Eliza's anger.
